last_episode_to_air.name: The Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Our duo has been through a crazy adventure while planning their wedding. But the question still remains. - Will they sail through? Will they get married or not ?

name: Happily Ever After
overview: A slice of life story that captures the essence of a modern millennial relationship and brings to light the hitches and glitches the millennial couple, Roneet and Avani, face as they strive to achieve their dream wedding.

seasons.name: Season 1
